posts.content:
Hi all!

My quest has continued for the build where half-orc is optimal.

So here is a half-orc assassin master. High strength, assassin improved invisibility, weapon master crit range UMD etc. No exp multiclass penalties

Base AB 50.

Tried to get assassin 9 asap to get its special undispellable improved invis without hurting the AB too much

He had to invest a lot of effort to become very smart, its hurt his constitution so he gets a toughness feat along the way. Perhaps I should take that feat earlier.

Maybe a human might have more skill points (to max listen, for example), a dwarf or gnome more HP but I think only half-orc can get to the AB quite that high, 

Anyway hope you enjoyed reading this, feel free to leave comments/suggestions
